content: crochet bat wind spinner is a scrap yarn project and works up quickly these make lovely halloween decorations the spinning bats will surely be the center of attraction to the trick-or-treaters you can crochet it to be either scary by choosing darker shades or sweet by crocheting it in lighter colors and adding a smile finished size my finished size using worsted weight yarn and 4 5 mm crochet hook was 10 inches long gauge not critical materials yarn worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver yarn in light grey you can substitute any yarn for this pattern and go down 1- 2 hook sizes from yarn recommendation hook 4 5 mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors yarn needle 10 mm safety eyes or black yarn and needle small piece of yarn in white and pink to embroider the eye details and mouth polyester fiberfill i hope you will crochet this along with me
